entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OperationVisitor cannot handle NoneOperation #69837
  • EnC: Updating type of a property creates a duplicate Property table entry #69834
  • Is VS displaying for internal names expected? #69830
  • Some commonly-reported diagnostic results at suggestion level cannot be disabled #69829
    17.8

Closed

  • Improve debugging experience of iterator properties #69827
  • Fuzz test the incremental state table #68459
    17.8
  • PERF: PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() unnecessarilly allocates when lazyNamespaces is empty #69833
  • DisallowNull, T? and inheritance #69832
  • File rename that changes case crashes a NavBar and Semantic Classification #69269
    17.8 P2
  • Don't give a diagnostic for inability to convert to an error type #69138
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Randomize analyzer instantiation to avoid static constructor/jit contention #69838
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix some issues with the MSBuild NuGet packaging #69835
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle long extension invocation chains #69831
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Make completion handler more resilient #69795
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix test after merge #69836
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #69760
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Modify the test to cover the scenario #69821
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add analysis and emit difference time spans to EnC telemetry #69794
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce cascading diagnostics on failed implicit conversion #69170
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Slightly fewer allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #69791
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Allow Razor to not supply dynamic file info if they don't want to. #69828
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump NuGet version #69824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Reduce allocations during ToDisplayString #69800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update LanguageServerHost to use NamedPipe #69816
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize readonly list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #69802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Bail out from remove unused member analyzer for ??= operator #69812
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Only sync selection when text identifier has focus in rename flyout #69825
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lazily build a case-insensitive comparison for performance #69756
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.6 #69761
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Parameters #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Use GetResult(out Exception) method for awaits #67487
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, Backlog
  • Collection expressions: support builder methods returning derived or implementing types #69770
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
